name: Genesis (itch) (Not_A_Virus, l._a._d._)
description:
2D arcade game where you have to defend the planet from total annihilation. Fight side by side with a friend to shoot down the color coordinated enemies. 

This game was build in 2 weeks with only 2 people. Lisse Dupain who was responsible for all art assets in the game (and for making this page look pretty) and Konrad Faes who was responsible for the coding. 

Some of the limitations we were given are that it had to be a 2D game using pixel art and it had to be able to run on low end devices. 

Due to it being intended for a custom made arcade controller, it is advised to change the controls on the unity startup menu.
